UKRAINE

Medical & Crisis
Response Membership

$250,000 of Medical Response

$39 per day

$150,000 of Crisis Response

$19 per day

  • SCROLL TO LEARN MORE

AN INHERENT RISKS INITIATIVE

Enabling you to safely (re)enter Ukraine
and (re)establish operations

Trusted by foreign governments, non-governmental organisations (NGOs), global media agencies, war crimes investigators and visiting dignitaries, Ukraine Response is the most comprehensive Response Membership available for individuals and groups operating in Ukraine. Inherent Risks has had a continued presence in the country since the conflict began providing risk advisory, medical evacuation and crisis response services to Lloyd’s of London insurers and their policyholders.

Our Difference

A proactive and fully indemnified Medical Evacuation & Crisis Response Membership with integrated risk mitigation tools enabling organisations and individuals to fulfil their duty of care obligations

Pre-Travel Safety Brief

Location specific pre-travel safety brief via video
or phone before deployment.

Itinerary Tracking

Check-in before you depart location(s) in Ukraine,
and when you arrive.

Live Risk Register

Location specific incident alerts, and risk advisory
if the security situation deteriorates.

Risk Zone Map

An easy to use risk map which identifies risk zones
where travel is permitted

In-Country Teams

Tried and tested in-country response teams,
and robust medical networks

24/7 Advice & Response

Medical, Risk & Crisis Advisory experts on standby 24/7
to assist Members in Ukraine

Membership Options

Choose between Medical Evacuation only, or purchase a Crisis Response add-on for an additional fee
per person, per day. Membership is available in the Green and Orange Zone(s), but NOT in the Red Zone.
To confirm which Zone You will be traveling in, check the live Risk Map online.

Enroll Now

Complete the form below for a no-obligation group or individual quote for Medical Evacuation
Membership, with or without a Crisis Response Membership upgrade

for a separate Accidental Death & Disability (AD&D) insurance quote, contact us for a referral.

FAQs

Answers to some frequently asked questions.

How does Response Membership compare to Insurance?

Response Membership is a bespoke emergency medical bill payment, medical evacuation, medical repatriation and crisis response programme, tailored by Inherent Risks, and provides Members with exclusive access to services, and on-the-ground capabilities to respond, beyond the limitations of most insurance policies, at an affordable price per person, per day.

Membership is available to all nationalities*, including In-Country Nationals (ICNs) of Ukraine.

* Membership is not available to citizens of Iran, North Korea, Cuba, Russia & Belarus, who also reside within either Iran, North Korea, Cuba, Russia & Belarus.

As with Insurance, all Members are subject to a Sanctions Check.

What happens if I am sick or injured in Ukraine?

You are advised to call or email the Emergency Response contact details on your Certificate of Membership as soon as is practically possible. Prior to travel, ensure a colleague or travel companion has a copy of your Certificate, in the event you are incapacitated, they can call on your behalf.

Once your Membership has been validated by our Response Team, we will confirm your location, and ask for as many details as possible about the reason you are calling. Our Teams are available 24/7 to provide medical and crisis advisory services, which include dispatching Response Teams to evacuate you to a medical facility (where applicable), and/or out of Ukraine (if required).

Is there an Age Limit for Response Members?

Unfortunately yes, by request of our Underwriters, Response Membership in Ukraine is not available if you are 70-years old older.

What happens if I am a victim of a Threat, Extortion or Kidnap in Ukraine?

You are advised to call or email the Emergency Response contact details on your Certificate of Membership as soon as is practically possible. Our retained Crisis Consultants are on standby 24/7 to provide immediate advice, and if required, to deploy a Response Team to evacuate you.

Can I extend my Response Membership after 30-days?

Yes, Response Membership is valid for 30-days, but Response Members can go online to purchase a new Membership for additional 30-day rotations, even if you are still in Ukraine.

What if I have pre-existing medical conditions?

Response Membership is designed to provide an affordable medical evacuation, medical bill payment, and medical repatriation service in the event of a serious medical emergency, as a result of war & terrorism, accident or serious illness.

If your injury or illness is in any way related to your pre-existing medical condition, you will not be eligible for indemnified services. That does not mean we will abandon you. Our services will still be available to you, but rather than being indemnified by Underwriters, the cost for services will be payable to us by you.

Can we purchase group membership for our organisation?

Yes, there is no limit to the amount of Response Memberships your organisation can purchase.

If your injury or illness is in any way related to your pre-existing medical condition, you will not be eligible for indemnified services. That does not mean we will abandon you. Our services will still be available to you, but rather than being indemnified by Underwriters, the cost for services will be payable to us by you.

Support Services

Inherent Risks also provides the following support services in Ukraine.

Risk Assessments

Not a ‘one-size-fits-all’ template, but a trusted
‘boots-on-the-ground’ approach

Journey Planning

There’s no substitute for experience. Our team has planned and tracked thousands of trips in Ukraine

Close Protection

Qualified and experienced, expat and in-country national professionals

Armoured Vehicles

A trusted network of armoured vehicles and vehicle recovery services

Safe House Network

A trusted network of ‘hybernation’ locations
throughout Ukraine

Translation & Interpretors

Certified translations of official documents, and vetted deployable interpreters

How can we help you?

Get in touch. Let’s talk about how Inherent Risks can support you.
